title: [Large-Scale] Quantitative Analysis Design for Enhancing Perceptions of Online Learning Success

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics knowledge and online learning platform usage experience
context.additional_context: Analysis of success factors in online learning using PBL (Project-Based Learning) for practical problem-solving in mathematics applicable to workplace tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively analyze demographic factors influencing online learning success.
Learners can interpret survey data using multivariate statistical techniques such as ANOVA.
Learners can evaluate the impact of technical literacy and prior experience on learning success in project-based assignments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
